entities.name: JEN-HSUN HUANG
entities.description: Jen-Hsun Huang is the President and Chief Executive Officer and co-founder of NVIDIA. He has been with the company since its inception in 1993. Prior to NVIDIA, he held various positions at LSI Logic Corporation and Advanced Micro Devices, Inc.

entities.name: COLETTE M. KRESS
entities.description: Colette M. Kress is the Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of NVIDIA. She joined the company in 2013. Prior to NVIDIA, she worked at Cisco Systems, Inc., Microsoft Corporation, and Texas Instruments Incorporated.

entities.name: AJAY K. PURI
entities.description: Ajay K. Puri is the Executive Vice President of Worldwide Field Operations at NVIDIA. He joined the company in 2005. Prior to NVIDIA, he held positions at Sun Microsystems, Inc., Hewlett-Packard Company, Booz Allen Hamilton Inc., and Texas Instruments Incorporated.

entities.name: DEBORA SHOQUIST
entities.description: Debora Shoquist is the Executive Vice President of Operations at NVIDIA. She joined the company in 2007. Prior to NVIDIA, she worked at JDS Uniphase Corp., Coherent, Inc., Quantum Corp., and Hewlett-Packard Corp.

entities.name: TIMOTHY S. TETER
entities.description: Timothy S. Teter is the Executive Vice President and General Counsel at NVIDIA. He joined the company in 2017. Prior to NVIDIA, he worked at the law firm of Cooley LLP and as an engineer at Lockheed Missiles and Space Company.

entities.name: NVIDIA
entities.description: NVIDIA is a technology company co-founded by Jen-Hsun Huang in 1993. It specializes in the design and manufacture of graphics processing units (GPUs) and related technologies.

entities.name: LSI LOGIC CORPORATION
entities.description: LSI Logic Corporation is a computer chip manufacturer where Jen-Hsun Huang was employed prior to founding NVIDIA.

entities.name: ADVANCED MICRO DEVICES, INC.
entities.description: Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (AMD) is a semiconductor company where Jen-Hsun Huang worked as a microprocessor designer before founding NVIDIA.

entities.name: CISCO SYSTEMS, INC.
entities.description: Cisco Systems, Inc. is a networking equipment company where Colette M. Kress served as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of the Business Technology and Operations Finance organization before joining NVIDIA.

entities.name: MICROSOFT CORPORATION
entities.description: Microsoft Corporation is a software company where Colette M. Kress held various positions, including Chief Financial Officer of the Server and Tools division, before joining NVIDIA.

entities.name: TEXAS INSTRUMENTS INCORPORATED
entities.description: Texas Instruments Incorporated is a semiconductor company where both Colette M. Kress and Ajay K. Puri held various positions before joining NVIDIA.

entities.name: SUN MICROSYSTEMS, INC.
entities.description: Sun Microsystems, Inc. is a computing systems company where Ajay K. Puri held positions in sales, marketing, and general management before joining NVIDIA.

entities.name: HEWLETT-PACKARD COMPANY
entities.description: Hewlett-Packard Company is an information technology company where Ajay K. Puri and Debora Shoquist held various positions before joining NVIDIA.

entities.name: BOOZ ALLEN HAMILTON INC.
entities.description: Booz Allen Hamilton Inc. is a management and technology consulting company where Ajay K. Puri held a position before joining NVIDIA.

entities.name: JDS UNIPHASE CORP.
entities.description: JDS Uniphase Corp. is a provider of communications test and measurement solutions and optical products for the telecommunications industry where Debora Shoquist worked as Executive Vice President of Operations before joining NVIDIA.

entities.name: COHERENT, INC.
entities.description: Coherent, Inc. is a manufacturer of commercial and scientific laser equipment where Debora Shoquist served as Senior Vice President and General Manager of the Electro-Optics business before joining NVIDIA.

entities.name: QUANTUM CORP.
entities.description: Quantum Corp. is a data protection company where Debora Shoquist worked as President of the Personal Computer Hard Disk Drive Division before joining NVIDIA.

entities.name: COOLEY LLP
entities.description: Cooley LLP is a law firm where Timothy S. Teter worked for more than two decades, focusing on litigating patent and technology-related matters before joining NVIDIA.

entities.name: LOCKHEED MISSILES AND SPACE COMPANY
entities.description: Lockheed Missiles and Space Company is an aerospace company where Timothy S. Teter worked as an engineer before attending law school and joining NVIDIA.
